mission.heading: Mission
mission.content:
Ensure healthy lifestyles
and the well-being of the population.

vision.heading: Vision
vision.content:
To become an event that changed
people's health for the better
and irrevocably.

left: Become a leader among medical platforms
Gain the trust of employees, partners and customers
right: Provide high security and reliability for employees, partners and customers
Implement the credo “We are all clients to each other”, respect each other and clients

content.line1: We are motivated by the value we bring to society, and even more motivated by the value we have yet to bring.
content.line2: We want the patient, the doctor and medicine to work hand in hand for the development of a healthy, happy and educated society to create a new and better world.

CEO.name: Sheikhislam Sahi
details: Neurosurgeon, neurobiologist.
30 Under 30 Forbes Member

RegionalOfficer.name: Islam Mamadzhanov
details: Entrepreneurship for 11 years
Founder of IMB Croup (IT company)
Founder, Erasmus SKSU (EdTech)
Education: University of Montana, Austria; Polytechnic of Valencia, Spain

ProductDirector.name: Alzhan Sainov
details: Crypto expert with 5 years of Experience
Creator of the concept of "Get treated-Earn" in MedData

LegalOfficer.name: Khalel Tuganbayev
details: More than 10 years of experience in law and more than 8 years in the Big Four company.
Advised on issues of the World Bank, the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development, Eurasian Resources Group. Participated in the development of laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

TechnicalDirector.name: Rachit Tomar
details: More than 10 years of experience in the field of medical technology
Worked on the development of well-known medical products in India
Participated in the creation of blockchain technology in the fintech sector

CMO.name: Yana Ten
details: An expert with 7 years of marketing experience
Built strategies for startups in such regions as the UAE, the UK, Indonesia and the CIS

Neurosurgeon.name: Aziz Akkaev
details: Worked in 40 countries
Founded 2 clinics of a new format - "Center for Pain Treatment and Regenerative Medicine"

HeadOfDesign.name: Khalilova Maryam
details: More than 19,000 hours in design, work in projects in 18 countries of the world

CPO.name: Dilmurat Islamov
details: Participated in the development of Zood Superapp and Alfabank

CFO.name: Sadvakas Sanjar
details: He has more than 7 years of audit experience in the "big Four"
At various times, he headed the reporting and control department, as well as financial departments in various industries

section8.heading: Awards
awards: TOP-100 innovative digital solutions of the world
Winner of the "Build Your Own Business" contest from the Sabi Foundation
